metadata.title: CVE-2024-47093 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Improper neutralization of input in Nagvis before version 1.9.42 which canlead to XSS

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-47093` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nagvis - 1:1.9.42-1
nagvis-demos - 1:1.9.42-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nagvis package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.9.42-1').
